answerText: The Outline of History[10] This author of Tono-Bungay and The Island of Dr. Moreau wrote The Outline of History.
heading: VCU Closed |2013 | Maryland A and Ohio State A | 16 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This book goes fourteen chapters before presenting "The First Civilizations." For 10 points each: [10] Name this forty-part overview of civilization, which presents an evolutionary perspective and a diminished role for Christianity, but overcame such controversy to sell two million copies after its 1919 publication.
